title: inactivity and refresh check in gradio
author: Phani Chodavarapu
description: when a gradio page is refreshed, it catches it and gives the notification of refresh action. when the UI is inactive , the asset catches it and gives the notification of inactivity. we can extend it for doing other actions like , if the user is inactive then logout the user or any other action can be assigned. Please note that UI in the asset is only front end, their is no backend code.
